Content: Common ships like system police or freighters should have default
models. So there are around 3 system police models, 2 longrange
freighter models, 2 passenger liners, 2 system freight transport
vessels etc. for every polity. This can be used to determine the
effectivnes of its abstract units. Like the piracy suppresion pro
system police hangar or cargo troughput per point in inter system
freight. In case of battle or draft this dafault models also inform the
used units. So if the system police is drafted it consists out of the
